A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I’ve seen this movie multiple times in theaters. Im a Star Wars fan and i had very high expectations. This movie works as a big band aid for the stuff that didn’t work in The Force Awakens\, but it goes too far. For example i wanted more poe and less Finn. They did that. I wanted more Luke. They did that. But in the end much of the travels of all the characters end up not mattering\, and the ending is entirely independent of most of the film. It went too far to swerve the audience. Too many things went strayed too far from cannon. This was an anti-fan film that was a very well made middle finger to cannon. I enjoyed that part but it went too far and forgot to tell a story id want to watch. Ill hate watch it again but its better than the prequels. Ill watch the next film bc i have to.
